sentences.english: They requested sappers to mend bridges or remove mines.
sentences.chinese: 他们要求坑道工兵修桥或拆雷。

sentences.english: The NATO player is advised to utilize the terrain and engineer units to dig in.
sentences.chinese: 给北约玩家的劝告是使用地形与工兵单位去挖地洞。

sentences.english: The GSA and the Army Corps of Engineers have struggled with that.
sentences.chinese: GSA和美国陆军工兵部队也曾经为此而奋斗过。

sentences.english: A clone combat engineer of the 38th Armored Division.
sentences.chinese: 第38装甲师的一名克隆人战斗工兵。

sentences.english: Croft and a sergeant from the pioneer and demolition platoon stepped up.
sentences.chinese: 克洛夫特和工兵爆破排的一个士官走了出来。

sentences.english: Carried by Crewmen, the Crewman Wrench is a much weaker version of the Engineer Wrench.
sentences.chinese: 载具乘员装备中的扳手比工兵的要弱一些。

sentences.english: Tank wrecks found on maps are no longer salvageable.
sentences.chinese: 地图上自带的坦克残骸将不能被轴心国工兵回收。

sentences.english: Engineer Corps of Japanese Army 16th Division removes blockage of sandbags at Zhongshan Gate.
sentences.chinese: 日军第十六师团的工兵在搬开封闭中山门的土袋。

sentences.english: The army engineers paraded round drill squares.
sentences.chinese: 工兵绕训练场列队行进。

sentences.english: Take control of the Green Beret, the spy, the sniper and the sapper.
sentences.chinese: 控制绿色贝雷帽，间谍，狙击手和工兵。

definition: defensive structure/military fortifications/(Tw) construction works/civil engineering works
